statements: DELETE FROM QuantumDataPackets WHERE source_node = 'Node A' AND packet_size > 100;
DELETE FROM QuantumDataPackets WHERE packet_id = 100 AND source_node = 'Node A';
DELETE FROM QuantumDataPackets WHERE routing_algorithm = 'Bellman-Ford Algorithm';
DELETE FROM quantum_packets WHERE packet_id = 1 AND source_id = 100;
DELETE FROM QuantumConnections WHERE node1_id = 1 AND node2_id = 2 AND connection_type = 'secure';
DELETE FROM QuantumPackets WHERE packet_size > 100 AND received = FALSE;
DELETE FROM quantum_packets WHERE packet_size > 100 AND source_address = 'A1'
DELETE FROM quantum_routing_nodes WHERE node_status = 'offline' AND node_location = 'Europe'
